How do AI agents securely manage identity across dynamic workflows? 🔐 Distinguished Engineer Grant Miller explains identity propagation, token exchange, and transitive trust in agentic systems. Discover how OAuth 2, OpenID Connect, and APIs ensure trust and prevent identity impersonation in multi-agent flows. 🤖

title: How will AI Agents Manage Identity & Build Trust in Complex Systems
